title: How to show off my talent to get a job - Quora

response.answer_text: No matter how modest it is,  you will have to make a start. Considering your talent, i would have suggested you to do something of your own. These qualities can make a great entrepreneur but given your preference for job, startups would be the best bet. f6s.com - #1 for startup founder deals, accelerators & funding has some good startup job opportunities. Amit Mishra can help you with that :) Startups might not offer you the best salaries in the beginning but the growth will be terrific. With talented pool of people, your skills would get groomed up and less number of people and hierarchy, your talent would get noticed and would reward your career in a significant manner.

As Anshul Agrawal rightly pointed, a lot of startups are looking at hiring bright and sharp people like yourself. You just need make people notice you but doing out of box things and network with people who can help you reach the right companies.  Startups might be the best bet and springboard for your career at present. Feel free to connect if I can help in any way. BEST OF LUCK!!

Assuming what you state (borderlining bragging, rightfully so) is right - there not be many jobs that can satiate your quick learning abilities and uncanny enthu. You may find enough intellectual stimulation in newly setup companies or as other answers alluded to - starting your own gig. If you do end up working for a company - choose a role that changes constantly and throws new challenges at you - so that you feel engaged for long haul. Take an inventor of your top 3 talents and check them against the job description when applying. It will make it easier in interview as well whe your natural flair comes to play. Good luck. Many more relevant career topics at Jobinterviewboard
Start your own blog and spread your knowledge. this will help you in getting good job as your online presence will speak more. Good luck!
